entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Json/Query: allow backtracking into parent json entities #28645
  • Allow ExecuteUpdate for entity splitting if all the properties being updated are in single table #28643
  • Scaffolding: Make it easier to generate by-convention configuration #28641
  • Scaffolding: Consider changing how we aggregate usings #28640
  • Disable logging on a DbContext instance #28639
  • Translate the new LINQ Order/OrderDescending #28634
  • Self-referencing many-to-many between TPH subtypes creates cascade cycles #28633
  • Parameterized Offset/Fetch makes query slower in batch mode #28632
  • Installing Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Design on WinUI project breaks the project #28631

Closed

  • Cosmos: Support AAD RBAC via the ClientSecretCredential #26491
    7.0.0
  • How do I get the Cosmos database Id so I can use GetCosmosClient() #25063
    7.0.0
  • Move table configuration methods to `(OwnedNavigation)TableBuilder` #28205
    7.0.0
  • Style: Error SA1514 Element documentation header should be preceded by blank line #28187
    7.0.0
  • When scaffolding, namespace isn't added for generic type parameter within an array #27087
    7.0.0
  • RevEng: Avoid redundant code in many to many #25547
    7.0.0
  • RevEng: Dedupe code in scaffolding code generator #25546
    7.0.0
  • Cannot build efcore #28614

PullRequests

Created

  • Add IConventionEntityTypeBuilder.GetTargetEntityTypeBuilder #28637

Merged

  • Cosmos: Support AAD RBAC via TokenCredential #28644
    auto-merge
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #28642
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Bump Castle.Core from 5.0.0 to 5.1.0 #28623
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #28638
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1 #28636
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • Move table configuration methods to (OwnedNavigation)TableBuilder #28630
    auto-merge
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #28635
    tell-mode, 6.0.9
  • Add test for runtime model generation with proxies #28621
  • Scaffolding: Create default templates #28549
  • Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.0.0-preview2.22096.2 to 5.0.0 #28624
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Implement stored procedure update mapping #28553
  • Implement ExecuteUpdate #28626
